name: [DEMO] Customizable Dungeon Generator
description:
The Customizable Dungeon Generator System is a Level Generation System designed to create rooms vertically going up, perfectly suitable for Mobile devices! The system was coded and designed to achieve a mix of Designer created content and Procedural Generation, so we can offer varied and endless content to our players while, at the same time, tailoring the best experience, challenges and rewards for them!

This is a System currently under review on the Unity Asset Store, soon this page will be updated with the Asset's link!

Asset Store Link (Soon!)

It has a public repository on GitHub where you can find the Documentation and report any problems you might have with the asset!

Public Repository Link

Customizable Dungeon Generator Documentation
